title: conferred on me by section 48(3) of the Finance Act 2024 (No. 43 of 2024),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2024 (Section 48)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2024 (Section 48) 

(Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2024 (section 48) (commencement) order 2025

title: conferred on me by section 48(3) of the Finance Act 2024 (No. 43 of 2024),
heading: 2. The 2nd day of May 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 48 of
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of May 2025 is appointed as the day on which section 48 of 

the Finance Act 2024 (No. 43 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 May, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th May, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [158] 3
